parameters.content:
# README
## N8N META Config
### 1- **Opengraph Image mode**: `screenshot` or `source` or `brand`
### - **screenshot**: _take a screenshot for web page based on longurl._
[![Screenshort Mode Demo]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
### - **source**: _scrape the source longurl og image and use it_
[![Source Mode Demo]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
### -  **brand**: _Generate blank background, color based on `Dark Mode` option_
[![Brand Mode Demo Dark]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} [![Brand Mode Demo White]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
### 2- **Dark Mode**: `true` or `false` (_Working with `brand` OGI mode only._)
- **true**: generate **black** patteren as background og image for the texts.
- **false**: generate **white** patteren as background og image for the texts.
### 3- **Brand Name**: Used for `brand` ogi background. The limit of brand name is 18 characters total.


## Switchy API Workflow Configuration
### This is part of Switchy API config i covered in this workflow.
| Input Field           | Description                                      |
|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| **`Switchy API Key`**       | _API Key for Switchy integration._                 |
| **`LongURL`**               | _The long URL to be shortened._                    |
| **`Custom slug`**           | _Custom slug for the shortened URL._               |
| **`tags`**                  | _Tags associated with the link._                   |
| **`Switchy Folder ID`**     | _ID of the Switchy folder to use._                 |
| **`Custom Domain (CNAME)`** | _Custom domain linked to Switchy._                 |


### This is public APIs I've Used in Workflow
#### Meta Data Stack
- **Manual Get Headers**: Custom HTTP request to fetch headers.
- **Dub.sh**: Scraping meta tags from web pages.
- **OpenGraph API**: Using OpenGraph to retrieve meta information.
#### Screenshot Stack
- **Method 1 - SCR**: First method for taking screenshots (API name microlink).
- **Method 2 - SCR**: Second method for taking screenshots (API name pxl.to).

‌
‌
‌
‌
‌
# 💡FYI:-
- ### **This workflow can be for any URL Shortener by just changing the API Services for the shortener SaaS.**
- ### **Do not use it for spam purposes as the used APIs is mostly workaround methods and not for "Big Use Cases".**
- ### **Breaking the APIs will force me to not share them free. and yes this workflow not for productions.**
- ### **Support 1:1 not included with this workflow. post anything you have** [here]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} and mention my account @Nskha.
- ### **Follow my new templates updates** [on telegram]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
